snippet: The Orange are 30-1 and likely to receive a top seed in the N.C.A.A. tournament, but off the court, investigations and lawsuits are threatening to tarnish Jim Boeheim’s season.
abstract: Syracuse men's basketball team is 30-1 and likely to receive a top seed in the NCAA tournament, but off the court, investigations and lawsuits are threatening to tarnish coach Jim Boeheim’s season.
lead_paragraph: The Orange are 30-1 and likely to receive a top seed in the N.C.A.A. tournament, but off the court, investigations and lawsuits are threatening to tarnish Jim Boeheim’s season.

headline.seo: Jim Boeheim’s Best and Worst Season at Syracuse
headline.main: At Syracuse, This Has Been Boeheim’s Best Season, and His Worst
headline.print_headline: At Syracuse, This Has Been Boeheim’s Best Season, and His Worst
